_project.description: All Shrines v4.1 With Impa Skip
_project.name: All Shrines

_route: (==) This route is amiibo only. You need 1 guardian amiibo and at least 2 fish amiibo. If you are looking for the fastest non-amiibo route: .link([click here]https://celer.itntpiston.app/#/gh/iTNTPiston/botw-routes/as33)
(==) The timing data for this route is in discord. .link([Click here]https://discord.com/channels/269611402854006785/303990410500374528/1070567834394034236)

SOR Clip get TOD.notes: Grab more shroom/apple before camp if you need

Grab Tree Branch.notes: For 2 FDC instances and IST. DO NOT BREAK. If you broke it, get a boko bat at cryo camp

Whistle spring to camp.notes: Whistle sprint so bokos start walking toward you

5 Arrows.notes: These are all normal arrows you pick up in the route

WB over barrier to mag.notes: Look down when doing FDC, so if you accidentally throw the tree branch, it doesn't fly too far. If your tree branch is badly damaged due to hitting the pot and you threw it, make sure get backup one-handed weapon

Check Resources =>.notes: .v(FireArrow) Fire Arrows; .v(Wood) Wood; .v(Hammer) Hammer Durability; .v(EOD) EOD Durability

.dir(.N) Turn to forest.notes: Land at the group of 5 endura shrooms. Pick them up, then pick up 1 endura shroom in the end + 1 radish if need

SQ to Beedle.notes: He should always be in front of the stable at this TOD

Buy 3 frogs 2 Butterfly.notes: If you only buy 2 butterfly instead of 3, it's faster to sell later. .v(Rupee) rupees left

+3 WB to shop.notes: Make sure you keep 2 shrooms, 2 peppers and 5 endura shrooms.

+_Cook<3-4 Endura>.notes: Faster to only have 2 endura left. If you have all 6 shrooms, cook 2 of them into one meal (or just cook 4). Use shroom, pepper, endura, butterfly, carrot to break 5 slots. .link([Simulator File]https://ist.itntpiston.app/?c=H4sIAAAAAAACA4WQwU4DMQxE7%2FmKkXqthArqgStSf6CFE%2BLgbbzdqNl4SbyF5etxtq0ACcEpmnjsefYCj10oKJ2M0aNhUKucsRc5hnS46ak%2BSOHQqQspKFbQzIwmU9p3pjrqe87P%2FDqG4cV0I29XsQbl%2FCVvMYjG4M3UUsjT3Fx0AsfwHjLuwMmPmVqR6imRlHEPyU0xebBOzm5hyUxHq4oWhHSOqPwDKHkYMKOMmSEpTpcgWzByq%2B5hbl1jV5tt1KaCQTtO2NGJ3Qx6pbTZNQS3rtSauUmxOXGetLObLPGUZv8SW45C3o1nbSyBo3ds9jneZe7lZJeNEXU307N%2FMYcu%2F517iZdBQx8%2BSIMkqKB%2B2838QJV1GG2jX%2FlXf5Bsv5P8yDszfgJ0%2BVinHgIAAA%3D%3D)

+Do IST in arrow shop.notes: .v(Rupee) rupees left after IST. Rest: 360 FA + 240 SA + 80 RS + 160 IA

+_Npc<2 Stam Upgrades>.notes: You do 8 stam upgrades max to not softlock. However 2 is enough

_Shrine::TalohNaeg.notes: This route skips radiant shield. The mind's eye shield has 16 durability and there are 14 scws.

.dir(E).notes: Get EOD inside shrine. Only use EOD when the route says so because we need it for the blights

Check Resources =>.notes: .v(FireArrow) Fire Arrows; .v(Wood) Wood; .v(Hammer) Hammer Durability; .v(EOD) EOD Durability

Korok Forest: (==) Dagah Keek buffered scw is entirely optional. Saves 40 seconds. If you are not going for the SCW, BLSS to trident then WB to the shop

_Shop<10 Ice Arrow>.notes: .v(Rupee) rupees left. You technically only need 5 ice arrows, but just getting more for backup

Buffered SCW (Optional).notes: Square WB from mipha statue East. Use minimap to land on the outer bridge

_Shrine::SohKofi.notes: We don't get a metal bow in this run. If you are worried that your bow might burn in Eldin, grab the bow in chest in this shrine

.dir(<N) Turn + .dir(N) Turn.notes: or super but I rarely get lag

+.dir(S) + BLSS.notes: TODO make a castle example video

_Chest<Dinraal Scale>.notes: Hammer the rock and drop the both potlids to make things load

+WB to docks.notes: Get bomb arrows or do Ya Naga bomb-arrow-less

+Drop down + .dir(<S) Turn midair.notes: Get flameblade if need. Optimally you don't need it. midair saves 10s but it's pretty tricky.

_Chest<Naydra Scale>.notes: Use Hammer for all the slabs

Backflip to shrine.notes: 1 Wood. .v(Wood) wood left (that's all needed wood)

+Cook Attack Food.notes: Used to cancel speed food in the end. If you are rusty on bosses, can get barb armor and cook something else to cancel speed food, or do windblight skip with speedfood somehow

.dir(<E) Turn, throw sword.notes: Can also let sword burn in eldin but sometimes it doesn't burn up

Check Resources =>.notes: .v(FireArrow) Fire Arrows; .v(Wood) Wood; .v(Hammer) Hammer Durability; .v(EOD) EOD Durability

_Shrine::KenaiShakah.notes: Hammer the rocks, no need bomb arrow

Check Resources =>.notes: .v(FireArrow) Fire Arrows; .v(Wood) Wood; .v(Hammer) Hammer Durability; .v(EOD) EOD Durability

BLSS + .dir(.E) Turn.notes: Can also use the minecart + wbs (old strat)

_Shrine::TuKaloh.notes: No barb if you cooked attack

Check Resources =>.notes: .v(FireArrow) Fire Arrows; .v(Wood) Wood; .v(Hammer) Hammer Durability; .v(EOD) EOD Durability

Infinity SCW.notes: Fire -> Shock. Land in shallow water and use cryo block

Check Resources =>.notes: .v(FireArrow) Fire Arrows; .v(Wood) Wood; .v(Hammer) Hammer Durability; .v(EOD) EOD Durability
.v(FireArrow) Fire Arrows; .v(Wood) Wood; .v(Hammer) Hammer Durability; .v(EOD) EOD Durability

Infinity SCW.notes: cut tree BLSS. use ice -> fire.

_Shrine::ThoKayu.notes: Need 3 fire arrows for TOD, 2 for Bareeda Naag and 1 for Goma Assagh. Rest for chus

Check Resources =>.notes: .v(FireArrow) Fire Arrows; .v(Wood) Wood; .v(Hammer) Hammer Durability; .v(EOD) EOD Durability

.dir(.N) Turn + BLSS.notes: Activate with kass diary. Can WB chain

Check Resources =>.notes: .v(FireArrow) Fire Arrows; .v(Wood) Wood; .v(Hammer) Hammer Durability; .v(EOD) EOD Durability

_Shrine::VooLota.notes: Amiibo Activate. Use Hammer for the switch inside

Check Resources =>.notes: .v(FireArrow) Fire Arrows; .v(Wood) Wood; .v(Hammer) Hammer Durability; .v(EOD) EOD Durability
.v(FireArrow) Fire Arrows; .v(Wood) Wood; .v(Hammer) Hammer Durability; .v(EOD) EOD Durability

Snowball strat.notes: Guardian Amiibo, use mag + gyro or use stasis 2 hits with EOD

Check Resources =>.notes: .v(FireArrow) Fire Arrows; .v(Wood) Wood; .v(Hammer) Hammer Durability; .v(EOD) EOD Durability

_Shrine::KorshOhu.notes: make noon before the orbs. Earliest is at Kay Noh.

Infinity SCW.notes: Sign activate. Make sure right stick is not neutral when activating the sign, which saves 10 frames

Check Resources =>.notes: .v(FireArrow) Fire Arrows; .v(Wood) Wood; .v(Hammer) Hammer Durability; .v(EOD) EOD Durability
.v(FireArrow) Fire Arrows; .v(Wood) Wood; .v(Hammer) Hammer Durability; .v(EOD) EOD Durability

.dir(<N) + .dir(NW) + .dir(W).notes: if you have ice arrow and is day time, can btb. not sure if night time btb is faster than wb

_Chest<3 AA>.notes: Throw away hammer while waiting for chest to load

_Equipment::Weapon<EOD>.notes: Should have old EOD, Boomerang, Claymore, new EOD for fights (in this order). If you don't have enough elemental for blights, pick up 5 arrow here

Check Resources =>.notes: .v(FireArrow) Fire Arrows; .v(Wood) Wood; .v(Hammer) Hammer Durability; .v(EOD) EOD Durability

.enemy(Fireblight).notes: 1=new EOD 3 slam, new EOD 4 slam, Boomerang 3 throw. 2=same as any%

Calamity.notes: same as any%, with old EOD spin throw and 6AA in the end
